string.text: Shows the Armor Condition as a percentage in cyan text. \n%c[ui_gray_2]Has no effect if the bar is disabled.
Shows the Weapon Condition as a percentage in orange text. \n%c[ui_gray_2]Has no effect if the bar is disabled.
Makes the Weapon Condition Bar disappear when you unequip. \n%c[ui_gray_2]Has no effect if the bar is disabled.
Shows the TOTAL amount of ammo you have for each 3 types available in the inventory.
Makes the Old Ammo appear where relevant (Such as not having its "good" counterparts)
Shows the amount of Radiation you have, on the Health Bar, going from left-to-right.
Shows the amount of blood you're losing, on the Stamina Bar, going from left-to-right.
Enables a subtle bar on the HP Bar that will show the exact amount of healing you will get when using a healing item.
